conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, angled perspective, and interior volume clearly shown.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear 3D extrusion, readable wall corners and thickness, strong cutaway with multiple wall faces visible; minor simplification/cleanup issues at some wall junctions/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout matches (living/dining left with balcony, kitchen top, toilet mid-right, bedroom bottom-right). Some proportional and partition deviations: utility/kitchen zone reads partially merged/altered, and toilet/entry partitioning appears slightly shifted compared to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present (sofa, dining table, bed) and placed in the expected rooms; kitchen modeled with counters/cooktop; bathroom fixtures implied but not fully/clearly modeled from this view.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good readability of walls/floors and openings; lighting is adequate. Some openings/frames are slightly ambiguous, and a few thin elements create minor visual confusion.

detected_errors.description: Utility + kitchen/service zone geometry appears altered vs 2D plan (partition/extent not perfectly preserved).
Door/window/opening placement and proportions are not perfectly consistent across all walls (some openings look simplified or shifted).
Bathroom fixture detail is not fully verifiable/complete from the render angle (fixtures appear simplified).

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, but with noticeable (non-fatal) deviations in service-area partitioning and some opening/fixture simplifications.
